author: USA TODAY, Jessica Priest, USA TODAY NETWORK
title: Reporters barred. Records delayed. How coronavirus shrouded local government in secrecy
description: Thirty-five states temporarily alter open government amid coronavirus. Agencies can hold meetings remotely and delay public information requests.
content:
Her daughter was hospitalized after she drank from a well it poisoned.
It made the roads in her neighborhood so treacherous she has nightmares about her family being swallowed up in 20-foot-deep sinkholes.
And now the company responsible may get the green l… [+11506 chars]
